00060 TSquare::TSquare( )
00061 {

00063         SO_NODE_ADD_FIELD(m_sideLength, (10.0));

00070 
00071 double TSquare::GetArea() const
00072 {
00073         return ( m_sideLength.getValue() * m_sideLength.getValue() );
00074 }
00075 
00076 
00077 BBox TSquare::GetBBox() const
00078 {
00079         Point3D min = Point3D(-m_sideLength.getValue()/2,0.0, -m_sideLength.getValue()/2);
00080         Point3D max = Point3D(m_sideLength.getValue()/2,0.0,m_sideLength.getValue()/2);
00081 
00082         return BBox( min, max );
00083 }
00084

00086 QString TSquare::GetIcon() const
00087 {
00088         return ":/icons/icons/node.png";
00089 }

00091 bool TSquare::Intersect(const Ray& /*objectRay*/, double* /*tHit*/, DifferentialGeometry* /*dg*/) const
00092 {
00093         return true;
00094 }
00095 
00096 bool TSquare::IntersectP( const Ray& objectRay ) const
00097 {
00098         return Intersect( objectRay, 0, 0 );
00099 }

00101 Point3D TSquare::Sample( double u, double v ) const
00102 {
00103         return GetPoint3D( u, v );
00104 }
00105 
00106 Point3D TSquare::GetPoint3D (double u, double v) const
00107 {
00108         if ((u < 0.0 && u > 1) && (v < 0.0 && v > 1))
00109         {
00110 
00111                 tgf::SevereError("Function TSquare::GetPoint3D called with invalid parameters" );
00112         }
00113 
00114         double x = (u * m_sideLength.getValue()) - (m_sideLength.getValue()/2);
00115         double z = v * m_sideLength.getValue() - (m_sideLength.getValue()/2);
00116 
00117         return Point3D(x,0,z);
00118 }
00119 
00120 NormalVector TSquare::GetNormal (double /*u*/, double /*v*/) const
00121 {
00122         return NormalVector( 0, 1, 0 );
00123 }

00126 void TSquare::computeBBox(SoAction*, SbBox3f& box, SbVec3f& center)
00127 {
00128         BBox bBox = GetBBox();
00129         // These points define the min and max extents of the box.
00130     SbVec3f min, max;
00131 
00132     min.setValue( bBox.pMin.x, bBox.pMin.y, bBox.pMin.z );
00133     max.setValue( bBox.pMax.x, bBox.pMax.y, bBox.pMax.z );;
00134 
00135     // Set the box to bound the two extreme points.
00136     box.setBounds(min, max);
00137 
00138    // This defines the "natural center" of the TCube. We could
00139    // define it to be the center of the base, if we want, but
00140    // let's just make it the center of the bounding box.
00141    center.setValue(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00142 }
00143 
00144 void TSquare::generatePrimitives(SoAction *action)
00145 {
00146     SoPrimitiveVertex   pv;
00147 
00148     // Access the state from the action.
00149     SoState  *state = action->getState();
00150 
00151     // See if we have to use a texture coordinate function,
00152     // rather than generating explicit texture coordinates.
00153     SbBool useTexFunc = ( SoTextureCoordinateElement::getType(state) ==
00154                           SoTextureCoordinateElement::FUNCTION );
00155 
00156     // If we need to generate texture coordinates with a
00157     // function, we'll need an SoGLTextureCoordinateElement.
00158     // Otherwise, we'll set up the coordinates directly.
00159     const SoTextureCoordinateElement* tce = 0;
00160     if ( useTexFunc ) tce = SoTextureCoordinateElement::getInstance(state);
00161 
00162 
00163         const int rows = 50; // Number of points per row
00164     const int columns = 50; // Number of points per column
00165     const int totalPoints = (rows)*(columns); // Total points in the grid
00166 
00167     float vertex[totalPoints][6];
00168 
00169     int h = 0;
00170     double ui = 0;
00171         double vj = 0;
00172 
00173         double u_step = 1.0 /(double)(rows-1); // Size of the step in parameter u to go from 0 to 1 in the number of rows
00174         double v_step = 1.0 /(double)(columns-1); // Size of the step in parameter v to go from 0 to 1 in the number of columns
00175 
00176     for (int i = 0; i < rows; ++i)
00177     {
00178         for ( int j = 0 ; j < columns ; ++j )
00179         {
00180                 Point3D point = GetPoint3D(ui, vj);
00181                 NormalVector normal = GetNormal(ui, vj);
00182 
00183                 vertex[h][0] = point.x;
00184                 vertex[h][1] = point.y;
00185                 vertex[h][2] = point.z;
00186                 vertex[h][3] = normal.x;
00187                 vertex[h][4] = normal.y;
00188                 vertex[h][5] = normal.z;
00189                 pv.setPoint(vertex[h][0], vertex[h][1], vertex[h][2] );
00190                 h++; //Increase h to the next point.
00191                 vj += v_step; // Increase parameter vj to go from initial 0 to 1 at the end of the row (keep the same ui for the whole row)
00192         }
00193         vj = 0; // Re-initialize parameter vj to 0 in order to start from 0 in the next row
00194                 ui += u_step; // Increase parameter ui to go from initial 0 to 1 in the last row.
00195     }
00196 
00197         const int totalIndices  = (rows-1)*(columns-1)*4;
00198     int32_t* indices = new int32_t[totalIndices];
00199     int k = 0;
00200     for( int irow = 0; irow < (rows-1); ++irow )
00201            for(int icolumn = 0; icolumn < (columns-1); ++icolumn )
00202            {
00203                 indices[k] = irow*columns + icolumn;
00204                 indices[k+1] = indices[k] + 1;
00205                 indices[k+3] = indices[k] + columns;
00206                 indices[k+2] = indices[k+3] + 1;
00207 
00208                 k+=4; //Set k to the first point of the next face.
00209            }
00210 
00211     float finalvertex[totalIndices][6];
00212     for(int ivert = 0; ivert<totalIndices;ivert++)
00213     {
00214         finalvertex[ivert][0] = vertex[indices[ivert]][0];
00215         finalvertex[ivert][1] = vertex[indices[ivert]][1];
00216         finalvertex[ivert][2] = vertex[indices[ivert]][2];
00217                 finalvertex[ivert][3] = vertex[indices[ivert]][3];
00218                 finalvertex[ivert][4] = vertex[indices[ivert]][4];
00219                 finalvertex[ivert][5] = vertex[indices[ivert]][5];
00220     }
00221 
00222 
00223     float u = 1;
00224     float v = 1;
00225 
00226         beginShape(action, QUADS );
00227     for( int i = 0; i < totalIndices; ++i )
00228     {
00229         SbVec3f  point( finalvertex[i][0], finalvertex[i][1],  finalvertex[i][2] );
00230         SbVec3f normal(finalvertex[i][3],finalvertex[i][4], finalvertex[i][5] );
00231         SbVec4f texCoord = useTexFunc ? tce->get(point, normal): SbVec4f( u, v, 0.0, 1.0 );
00232 
00233         pv.setPoint(point);
00234         pv.setNormal(normal);
00235         pv.setTextureCoords(texCoord);
00236         shapeVertex(&pv);
00237 
00238 
00239     }
00240     endShape();
00241     delete[] indices;
00242 
00243 }
